title: Kelly Rowland dazzles in chic blazer dress as she joins Ashanti at Lifetime's holiday party in LA
text:
The holidays are just around the corner, which means another lineup of Lifetime Christmas movies.

They rang in the holidays early Tuesday with a star-studded Christmas celebration in Los Angeles.

Kelly Rowland dazzled in black and white as she walked the red carpet among the likes of Ashanti, Tia Mowry and Melissa Joan Hart.

Black and white: Kelly Rowland dazzled in black and white Tuesday as she walked the red carpet at Lifetime's holiday party in Los Angeles

Orange you glad? Ashanti hit the red carpet in an orange suit jacket, which she belted as a sexy mini dress

She wore a long white double-breasted blazer as a mini dress, paired with some thigh-high black velvet stiletto boots.

Rowland completed the look with a pair of silver chandelier earrings and a grocery bag style jeweled purse.

Ashanti hit the red carpet in an orange suit jacket, which she belted as a sexy mini dress.

She showed some cleavage in the plunging number with a gold Chanel broach and matching earrings.

Black velvet: She wore a long white double-breasted blazer as a mini dress, paired with some thigh-high black velvet stiletto boots

Dripping in jewels: Rowland (left) completed the look with a pair of silver chandelier earrings as she posed alongside Ashanti (right)

Hell on heels: The ensemble was completed with a pair of pointed six-inch stilettos with clear straps

Red carpet queens: Tia Mowry cut a classic look in a grey wool flannel dress, which featured ornamental floral buttons. Melissa Joan Hart sported a sheer black striped blouse with billowy sleeves, tucked into black trousers

The ensemble was completed with a pair of pointed six-inch stilettos with clear straps.

Mowry cut a classic look in a grey wool flannel dress, which featured ornamental floral buttons.

Hart sported a sheer black striped blouse with billowy sleeves, tucked into black trousers.

All I want for Christmas is... Kelly got into the Christmas spirit as she posed on Santa's lap

Nice to see you: She gave a little wave outside the venue as she made her way inside, while holding a glittering clutch bag

How does she do it? She looked absolutely stunning as her car door flung open and she posed for a few more snaps

Hilarie Burton stunned in a shimmering pink floral dress with a plunging neckline and long billowy sleeves.

Vanessa Lachey served '80s vibes in a belted sequined black dress with a large bow around the neck.

She completed the look with a pair of black leather pumps and some costume diamond rings.

Pink floral: Hilarie Burton stunned in a shimmering pink floral dress with a plunging neckline and long billowy sleeves

'80s vibes: Vanessa Lachey served '80s vibes in a belted sequined black dress with a large bow around the neck. She completed the look with a pair of black leather pumps and some costume diamond rings

Polka dots: Sarah Drew sported a white blouse with black polka dots, tucked into a pair of high-waisted black trousers

Punk chic: Soleil Moon Frye rocked a black leather moto jacket over a red bodycon dress with a pair of black Doc Martens

Textured flowers: Dee Wallace donned a boxy velvet blue and bronze ombré blouse with multi-colored textured flowers

Sparkling black: Kim Fields put on a busty display in a sparkling black dress, which was printed with silver stars. She completed the look with silver hoop earrings, some black and silver bracelets and a pair of silver jeweled stilettos booties

Blue tartan: Patrick Duffy sported a blue tartan suit jacket with a white gingham dress shirt tucked into a pair of jeans

Sarah Drew sported a white blouse with black polka dots, tucked into a pair of high-waisted black trousers.

Soleil Moon Frye rocked a black leather moto jacket over a red bodycon dress with a pair of black Doc Martens.

Dee Wallace donned a boxy velvet blue and bronze ombré blouse with multi-colored textured flowers.

Kim Fields put on a busty display in a sparkling black dress, which was printed with silver stars.

She completed the look with silver hoop earrings, some black and silver bracelets and a pair of silver jeweled stilettos booties.

Patrick Duffy sported a blue tartan suit jacket with a white gingham dress shirt tucked into a pair of jeans.

Squad goals: The ladies posed together on the red carpet, as they were joined by Kyla Pratt
description: The star-studded guest list also included Vanessa Lachey, Hilarie Burton, Tia Mowry and Melissa Joan Hart, who had a mini Sabrina the Teenage Witch reunion with Soleil Moon Frye.
